titles.title: To amend title IV of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to adjust the monthly multiemployer plan benefit guaranteed thereunder.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 12/14/2000--Introduced. Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) to adjust guaranteed monthly multiemployer plan benefit amounts.
